desc: Handmade, vegan, and fragrant. Based in Gallatin, TN, Scent of the Sun is a mother-and-son soap company creating artistically designed, richly scented vegan soaps, lotions, bath bombs, and accessories. Learn more and treat yourself to soaps made in small batches in the Greater Nashville area.

layout.text: Now Showing at Knoxville's Painted Tree!
Want to try our scents in-person in the Knoxville area? Find our new display at the Painted Tree Boutiques or at one of our other store displays in the greater Nashville area.
